title: Unlocking High-Efficiency Energy Storage and Conversion with Biocompatible Electrodes: The Key Role of Interfacial Interaction Assembly and Structural Design

Biocompatible electrodes, situated at the intersection of bioelectronics and soft electronics, hold the promise of groundbreaking advancements in human-machine interaction and bio-inspired applications. Their development relies on achieving stable, robust...
